name: Mutant Mudds Super Challenge
description:
Download Mutant Mudds Super
Challenge for free if you have already
downloaded the Wii U™ version. (Your
Wii U™ and Nintendo 3DS™ must be
linked with the same Nintendo
Network ID.)

Here comes a challenge! Mutant
Mudds Super Challenge!! Over 40
levels filled with malicious mutant
mudds. This adventure is designed for
super players; featuring a host of new
platforming challenges and unique
boss fights that will test your skills.

Max receives special intel, revealing
the location of the original meteor
impact site and the fact that mutant
mudds are still being spawned from it!
Max sets out from a secret hideout in
the jungle to locate the meteor and
destroy it for good!

Run, jump, hover, and blast your way
across five new vibrant worlds,
presented with colourful neo-retro
pixel art and sublime chiptune music.
Defy the laws of the second dimension
by leaping between foreground and
background layers, dispensing muddy
justice with your faithful water
cannon. Utilize your trusty power-ups
to traverse tricky obstacles and gain
access to special secret levels.

Super Secrets! 20 special playable
characters are hidden throughout the
game. Can you find them all? Over 40
chiptunes from the Mutant Mudds
soundtrack can be unlocked and
listened to in the jukebox room.
